00001 import wx
00002 import wx.aui
00003 
00004 class MyFrame(wx.Frame):
00005 
00006     def __init__(self, parent, id=-1, title='wx.aui Test',
00007                  size=(800, 600), pos=(1,1), style=wx.DEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE):
00008         wx.Frame.__init__(self, parent, id, title, pos, size, style)
00009 
00010         self._mgr_mgr = wx.aui.AuiManager(self)
00011 
00012         # create several text controls
00013         text1 = wx.TextCtrl(self, -1, 'Pane 1 - sample text',
00014                             wx.DefaultPosition, wx.Size(200,150),
00015                             wx.NO_BORDER | wx.TE_MULTILINE)
00016 
00017         text2 = wx.TextCtrl(self, -1, 'Pane 2 - sample text',
00018                             wx.DefaultPosition, wx.Size(200,150),
00019                             wx.NO_BORDER | wx.TE_MULTILINE)
00020 
00021         text3 = wx.TextCtrl(self, -1, 'Main content window',
00022                             wx.DefaultPosition, wx.Size(200,150),
00023                             wx.NO_BORDER | wx.TE_MULTILINE)
00024         
00025         text4 = wx.TextCtrl(self, -1, 'Pane 4 - sample text',
00026                             wx.DefaultPosition, wx.Size(200,150),
00027                             wx.NO_BORDER | wx.TE_MULTILINE)
00028 
00029         # add the panes to the manager
00030         self._mgr_mgr.AddPane(text1, wx.LEFT, 'Pane Number One')
00031         self._mgr_mgr.AddPane(text2, wx.BOTTOM, 'Pane Number Two')
00032         self._mgr_mgr.AddPane(text4, wx.RIGHT, 'Pane Number Four')
00033         self._mgr_mgr.AddPane(text3, wx.CENTER)
00034 
00035         # tell the manager to 'commit' all the changes just made
00036         self._mgr_mgr.Update()
00037 
00038         self.Bind(wx.EVT_CLOSE, self.OnCloseOnClose)
00039 
00040 
00041     def OnClose(self, event):
00042         # deinitialize the frame manager
00043         self._mgr_mgr.UnInit()
00044         # delete the frame
00045         self.Destroy()
00046 
00047 
00048 app = wx.App()
00049 frame = MyFrame(None)
00050 frame.Show()
00051 app.MainLoop()
